column2: df.impActivities_binom <- df.raw_binom %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.4", names(df.raw_binom))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:7) %>% group_by(Q2.3, statement)
# How often ONLINE vs OFFLINE activities
df.onOffActivities_binom <- df.raw_binom %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.5", names(df.raw_binom))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:13)
plot.on_yes_binom <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities_binom %>% filter(online == 1, Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.on_no_binom <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities_binom %>% filter(online == 1, Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.off_yes_binom <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities_binom %>% filter(online == 0, Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.off_no_binom <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities_binom %>% filter(online == 0, Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.on_yes_binom, plot.on_no_binom, plot.off_yes_binom, plot.off_no_binom, nrow = 2, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "right")
